data.eml:eml: New species of bumblebee catfish of the genus Batrochoglanis Gill, 1858 (Siluriformes: Pseudopimelodidae) from the Aripuanã River basin, Mato Grosso, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shibatta, Oscar A. (2019): New species of bumblebee catfish of the genus Batrochoglanis Gill, 1858 (Siluriformes: Pseudopimelodidae) from the Aripuanã River basin, Mato Grosso, Brazil. Zootaxa 4674 (2): 243-263, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4674.2.6
